title: FIP Crypto on Airdrop Strategy Mistakes with Wallet Checkers
summary: FIP Crypto discusses a common airdrop mistake of relying on wallet checkers to outline airdrop strategies. The note suggests that using these tools as a primary strategy guide may be ineffective or misleading for maximizing airdrop opportunities.

title: Your Top Crypto Alpha #68 Weekly Curated Content
summary: Duo Nineâš¡YCC shared a restack of weekly curated crypto alpha content. This appears to be part of a regular series providing curated cryptocurrency insights and opportunities for readers.

title: Tim.0x on Revenue as True Business Success Metric in Crypto
summary: Tim.0x argues that traditional metrics like volume, TVL, and active addresses are easily gamed and unreliable. Revenue is highlighted as the only ungameable metric that truly represents product demand and value accrual, suggesting a shift in how crypto project success should be evaluated.
